translation.privacy_notice: Your photos stay right here on your phone or computer. Nothing is saved in the app or anywhere else! ☺️
translation.intro_description: Create professional ID photos from your own photos in just a few clicks! Supports various ID photo sizes required in Japan such as My Number, driver's license, and resumes.

templates.select_description: Select the type of ID photo you want to create.

upload.click_or_drag: Click to select a file or drag and drop an image here
upload.tip_light: Take photos in a bright place
upload.tip_bg: Use a plain background if possible
upload.tip_quality: Use high-resolution photos for better quality

crop.guide_text: Move or resize the red box so that the face fits properly.
crop.tip_head: Top of head to chin should be 70-80% of photo height
crop.tip_center: Center the face in the photo

result.actual_size_info: ↑ Displayed in actual L size (89mm x 127mm)
result.layout_text: 4 photos of {{name}} ({{description}}) are placed on L size.
result.print_step1: Click the 'Download Image' button below to save the image
result.print_step2: Transfer the image to a convenience store multi-copy machine via USB memory or smartphone app
result.print_step3: Print in L-size (100% scale, 'borderless' setting off)
result.print_note: * Convenience store multi-copy machines only support JPEG format. Images generated by this app are saved in JPEG format.
